title: 1-20 x Ice Cooling Towel Neck Wrap For Sports Running Jogging Gym Chilly Towels

1-20 x Ice Cooling Towel Neck Wrap For Sports Running Jogging Gym Chilly Towels
What is the principle?
  The super absorbent fiber weaving technology of mesh towel can adjust the internal moisture and lock a certain amount of moisture, so it is like an air conditioner, and you will become cool in a few seconds.
Just like the sweat on your skin, when water evaporates, it becomes cold.

title: Cooling Towel Neck Wrap Chilly Ice Towel for Sports Running Jogging Yoga 2024
item_description:
Cooling Towel Neck Wrap Chilly Ice Towel for Sports Running Jogging Gym Yoga
FEATURES:
【INSTANT COOLING】- Our cooling towel is made of microfiber hyper-evaporative breathable material, it has a soft feel, is super absorbent and breathable. This towel is a physical cooling by the evaporation of water molecules.
【COOLING EFFECT】- It’s a magic towel chills instantly. Cool down quickly by simply soaking it, wringing out the water and shaking it.Just a few seconds the chill towel will keep cooling for several hours and easy to reactivate it by repeating the same steps.
【COMFORTABLE & SOFT MATERIAL】- Made of premium microfiber with a mesh pattern, this ice cool towel is chemical-free, durable, soft and skin-friendly. It's breathable, super absorbent and dries quickly. Perfect for sports and travel.
【COMPACT & LIGHTWEIGHT】- It has a great size of 30 x 11 inches and light weight. You can use it as a cooling bandana, scarf, headband, neck band.
【MULTI PURPOSE】- It's perfect for hot flashes, outdoor activities, indoor exercise, vacations to hot places, fever or headache therapy, heatstroke prevention, sunscreen protection, cooling while absorbing sweat during hot summer days.Great for running, cycling, workout, bowling, golf, yoga, gym, fitness etc.
THREE SIMPLE STEPS TO CHILL OUT WITH YOUR COOLING TOWEL !
Soak It With Water Activate your cooling towel by simply soaking it with water. There are no chemicals or cooling agents, this is an cooling towel, putting basic physics at work!
Wring It Out Wring out the towel to help start the evaporation.
Enjoy Around Your Neck In just a few second, the cooling towel will get cold. Wear it on a hot day, so you can feel cool regardless of the heat.
PACKAGE INCLUDE:
1 x Cool towel (Blue/Green/Gray/Red/Purple)
